alert.note: Alert for Susquehanna (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 3:28PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Susquehanna County through 400 PM EDT... At 328 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Springville, or 9 miles north of Tunkhannock, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Springville and Dimock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
